import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Authors from './components/Authors' import Books from './components/Books' import LoginForm from './components/LoginForm' import NewBook from './components/NewBook' const App = () => { const [page, setPage] = useState('authors') const [token, setUserToken] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { setUserToken(localStorage.getItem('book-user-token')) }, []) const loggedIn = token ? <> : null const loggedOut = token ? null : <> return (
{loggedIn} {loggedOut}
) } export default App
